column.name: correct
column.remarks: Correctness is independent of the grade (depends on the grading schema)

column.name: import_job_id
column.remarks: The ID of the importing job

column.name: identifier
column.remarks: Test case identifier generated by the testing framework

column.name: show_private
column.remarks: Show private test cases after students answer correctly

column.name: show_evaluation
column.remarks: Show evaluation test cases after students answer correctly

column.name: instance_id
column.remarks: The instance this announcement is associated with. This only applies to instance announcements.

column.name: host
column.remarks: Stores the host name of the instance. The www prefix is automatically handled by the application

column.name: type
column.remarks: The class of language, as perceived by the application.
